overview:
Dan is well regarded as a champion sales Director and leader, with over 15 years experience he has the type of pedigree and background that puts him at the forefront of delivering unsurpassed achievements.

Dan is no stranger to the world of tech-startups, with his winning ability he was successful at growing Wimdu from scratch as one of the key founding members who was able to quickly grow a European and Global presence for winning new clients and expanding the brand rapidly whilst watching it receive 3 rounds of funding in the process to what is now one of the biggest single seed investments in history with over $110m investment.

Dan gained most of his experience in sales from a young age having worked for News Corp on “The Sunday Times” in the early part of his career before the internet boom and witnessed the birth of traditional print media formats migrate online a challenge that would eventually allow others to build on his knowledge.

With his entrepreneurial spirit, big name client wins (such as Manchester United, British Airways) Dan remains very excited to be involved at the early stages of Jumio and help it become the most recognised and addictive provision of ID verification and payment methods available to merchants.
